name: Red Hat Container Embedded metadata
description: This describes necessary metadata to make security determinations about a container image.

name.description: This defines a canonical name for a container. This is likely to be displayed to an end-user.

org.opencontainers.image.created.description:
This is the creation timestamp of the container.

This MUST be a complete RFC3339 timestamp

cpe.description:
This is the CPE Name identifying this container.

Any version attributes SHOULD NOT be provided.
Containers with distinct CPE Names MUST be considered distinct pieces of software with incomparible versions.

architecture.description: This is the intended architecture of the container.
architecture.$comment: This is modern(ish) architectures as their golang name. This is how they're referred to in OCI specifications.
